alert.note: Alert for Delta; Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 12:10PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central Upper Michigan, including the following counties, Delta and Schoolcraft. * WHEN...Until 300 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1201 PM EDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicate heavy rainfall has occurred across the warned area from last night through early this morning. Between 3 and 8 inches of rain fell. - Some locations that will experience flooding or considerable standing water include... Areas near M-94 between Steuben and Manistique eastward to around Blaney Park. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
